      static java.util.ArrayList<ACL> ZooDefs.Ids.CREATOR_ALL_ACL
      This ACL gives the creators authentication id's all permissions.
      static java.util.ArrayList<ACL> ZooDefs.Ids.OPEN_ACL_UNSAFE
      This is a completely open ACL .
      static java.util.ArrayList<ACL> ZooDefs.Ids.READ_ACL_UNSAFE
      This ACL gives the world the ability to read.
